results.title: Valentine's Day Mantel Mantle Scarf Decoration red heart live love laugh
results.description:
This scarf has 11 triangles, sewn onto a white scarf.  
There are 2 prints on this scarf.  One is white hearts on a red background.  The second print is "live love laugh" written in cursive with small red hearts.  The dangly bits are a red heart between 2 white beads with a 'cat eye' effect.
Triangles have been machine sewn to the red scarf.  
Rear of red scarf that sits on the mantle has been finished with a serger rolled edge hem. 
Dangly bits have been created by me and hand sewn to the bottom of the triangles.

DIMENSIONS: Scarf: 60 inches long by approximately 4 inches Deep. Triangles: 8inches tall. Full drop length with ornament is 9 inches.

100% cotton. Dangly bead bits are not machine washable.  I recommend spot cleaning with mild soap and cold water.  Line dry.

See something you’d like to change? Need a longer or shorter scarf?Send me a message! I’d love to help you!  


(Mantle decorations not included, this listing is for the scarf only).

results.title: hello png, greeting, Live Love Laugh png, hi png, positivity png, pngs, kindness png, live love smile, vibe check png, be a nice human png
results.description:
I use to be very shy. I hated saying, "hello" because I knew it would put attention on me and I would be in a conversation. I had severe anxiety and didn't know what to say or how to communicate in conversations, so I tried to avoid them. It is now several years later and I am a communicating social butterfly. I love talking and communicating with people. In fact, I am a design teacher. 

Many of my students have anxiety and find communication very hard. So I made critiques and communication a huge part of my classes. I love seeing the improvements over time. 

I love designing stuff around positivity. Also...

This is the time to spread love, joy, and happiness by making the world happy one smile at a time.

We all need some positivity, good vibes, and happiness daily. We are doing our part to create that in a digital way that affects you and others around you. This pngs promotes positive messages in an aesthetically pleasing design. Use this png to ignite communications, as a communication starter, and to spread positive spirit everywhere you go. Let's go out and spread some daily joy to others.

I designed each png. No copyright issues here. 

You are purchasing an individual license. You can use them in your designs and creations. You can use them on your products to sell. 

_________________________________________________________________________________

You can't redistribute these. 
You can NOT re-sell or re-distribute the PNG, or JPG files.
You can NOT use any of these items in on-demand services.

_________________________________________________________________________________

My intent is to create positive, funny, caring, and entertaining digital files for you to use to promote or sell your products.
	
What you get: 
An immediate downloadable, non-watermarked PNG, and JPG file. 


You get 2 types of files…
-	high-quality JPG
-	high-quality PNG

NOTE: Any of my SVGs or PNGs can be placed on a shirt. If you prefer a shirt, purchase any shirt and let me know which SVG you'd like.

Things you should know before you buy:
•	These files are non-refundable, if you have any issues, please contact me and I will help you figure it out.
•	These files are digital so there is no physical file available
•	I am not responsible for printing or user error issues, however, let me know if there are any issues.

results.title: Grandma Love Laugh Spoil, Grandma Sign, Grandparents Gift, Grandma Gift, Grandparents Day
results.description:
What a perfect gift for a grandma!  They all just spoil the kiddos rotten, and love them dearly. 

SIZE: roughly 8x14.

You will check from the drop down menu if you are wanting black or white background as pictured in the photos. If you choose black the font will be white; if you chose white the font will be black. You will see in the third photo stain options - please leave your option in the message to seller box at checkout.

Each sign is hand-cut, and hand-painted by me! The wood is never the same as the next piece so some wood may have knots and imperfections in the wood. 

If you have any other questions please send me a message and I will get back with you in a timely manner. Thanks for shopping small!
_________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Please note- Each sign is an original (neat right?) since I hand paint them all. Due to the character of the wood, sometimes knots and natural imperfections are present. I do my best to pick out the best looking pieces of wood, but also feel that slight imperfections help add to the character of my handmade signs. 

Handling and Shipping Time-

The turnaround time for signs are 3-7 business days. I feel that this is very important as waiting weeks before an item is shipped isn't what I would personally want if I were ordering a sign. Please allow additional time for shipping. Signs do ship priority which is 2-3 days most of the time.

Why choose The Rustic Buckle?-

I absolutely love what I do, and love that I can help bring character to your home. I am very particular about the products I use, and I take a lot of pride in each and every piece I make. I always like to make sure everyone is completely satisfied with their orders. This is a dream of mine, and making people happy is part of that. If for any reason you're not happy with your item please let me know, and I will work with you and do my best to fix it.


Custom orders-

Would you like a custom order?? I love to do custom orders! I can change any of my current signs or design a new sign for you. Just send me an etsy conversation and I we can discuss what you are wanting. We will create a custom listing with your name on it for purchase. Also, check out my shop policies for custom signs.

results.title: The Only Thing Better Than Having You for My MOM Is .....My Children Having You for Their GRANDMA. Great Sign for your Mom!
results.description:
"The only thing better than having you for my mom is my children having you for their grandma!" Grandma is sure to love this sign! Tell your mother how much she means to you and your children with this perfect sign! 

*We offer several different family items in our shop so be sure to check this section, so you get the one that is the perfect fit for you.

We can also change any wording or leave just the way we have created. Personalized gifts make a great way to go, everyone loves the special touch

* This sign measures approximately 12 x 16 inches and is on 3/8 inch blondewood. 

* Creation is shown in Black/Antique White, Medium Blue/Antique White, and Barn Red/Antique White. 

* Several other color options available in drop down selection. The first color will be the color of the text & second color will be the background.

* Shipment is generally 3 to 5 business days.

* If we are shipping directly as gift, we can enclose a small handwritten note card, be sure to let us know what you want the card to say in the NOTES section when you order.

* For PERSONALIZED signs or signs you want modified please put the information in the NOTES section when placing order.

* Hanger attached on backside for easy hanging

* This is hand painted then laser engraved item is made to order.

We have over 700 items in this Etsy shop so be sure to take a look around in the different sections we offer. https://www.etsy.com/shop/ExpressionsNmore?ref=hdr_shop_menu

Also Be sure to check out our 2nd Etsy shop which includes color creations from the use of our LED UV flatbed https://www.etsy.com/shop/SignsForExpressions?ref=hdr_shop_menu

* PROCESS Our handcrafted creations are made using a 7 step process to create a beautiful expression to be cherished for years to come. Two contrasting colors of paint are applied, the design is laser engraved, a fine hairline is applied to the design which gives an awesome touch. The final touches are completed once it goes through our antiquing process with edges distressed.

* COLOR We have a variety of color choices, but if you don't see what you are looking for, please ask  & we will see if we can make it happen for you. Keep in mind when selecting the color options, the first color is the text color, while the second color is the background. See policies for additional questions/clarification on colors.

* Please note these signs are not massed produced but each is unique and no two are exactly the same.

*When working with wood and the antiquing process, each sign has its own warmth and charm. While we try to get the best wood at the lumber yard, sometimes there will be knots or other slight imperfections in the wood, this is considered adding character to the rustic style of this line of our signs. Thanks for stopping by our shop and please do not hesitate to ask any questions.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Sign for Home or Outdoor Decor Made from Rust Free Aluminum
results.description:
Metal Live Laugh Love Sign - Metal Letters - Metal Wall Art - Word Wall Art - Outdoor Decor - Home Decor - Quote Set - Wall Art MetalMetal Laugh Sign - Metal Letters - Metal Wall Art - Live Laugh Love - Outdoor Decor - Home Decor - Word Art - Quote Set - Wall Art Metal - Family

Our Metal Live Laugh Love Sign, Metal Wall Art is made from 18 gauge steel sourced from the USA. Unlike vinyl wall hangings, our metal pieces are sturdy and made to last. No worry of peeling here! We powder coat our pieces in either black or a bronze color as shown. Powder coat creates a barrier around the metal that is stronger than paint and protects your piece from rusting. This allows you to display your Word Art or Quote Set as indoor home decor or outdoor decor. Listing photos of single words are shown with our bronze powder coat. 

Prefer the rustic look of a metal patina? We also offer the bare steel version which will rust/patina over time. The listing photo of set shows bare steel with natural patina. 

This piece is comprised of 3 separate words Live 8" tall by 19.5" wide, Laugh 8" tall x 25" wide, and Love 8" tall x 20.5" wide.  Price for this set is a 20% discount from buying each word separately.

Have a color request? We can help with that! Please note that color requests are based on availability and may need extra time so we can order your special color for you. 

Like the sign but have a different size in mind? We can help you with that too. Just send us a message with your size requests and we will get back to you with a new price for your piece. 

Have a look at some of our other work by clicking here:

https://www.etsy.com/shop/SeasideMetalDesign

Shipping:

We use USPS calculated rates. Sometimes using a different carrier may be more economical for customers on the west coast. If USPS shipping rates seem extraordinary, please contact us so we can get you a quote through a different carrier.

If overages in shipping fees are collected, we will refund shipping if the overage exceeds $2.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Pillow,Farmhouse Pillow,Worded Pillow,Rustic Home Decor, Expression Pillow, Inspirational Pillow,Housewarming gift,Wedding
results.description:
Personalized pillows make a wonderful gift for that special someone – or for yourself!  Not only can the letters be personalized, but I can also change the colors of the background/lettering.  Simply send me a note and I will do my best to accommodate your request.

Details:
The pillow is constructed from 100% cotton duck fabric. The attention to detail is shown in all aspects - it closes with an invisible zipper and has reinforced stitching on all the stress points.  All fabric edges are overlocked and all lettering is sewn on with a satin stitch – not just ironed – to prevent fraying.

Sizing:
The pillow measures 16x26 and INCLUDES the insert.  If you would like just the cover, please let me know and I can make an adjustment to the listing for you.


Care:
To care for the pillow cover, hand wash with cold water and line dry.  Iron inside out but do NOT use steam.  This will cause the letters to buckle and become bumpy.

Shipping:
Take a look at my shop page for shipping policies.

Please check out my shop for more pillows and coordinating items.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Script Afghan PDF Pattern for sc, knit or tss - Graph + Written Instructions - Instant Download
results.description:
This pattern includes both a charted graph pattern and row-by-row written instructions to crochet or knit this afghan featuring the words "Live Laugh Love" in a script font. This would make a fantastic wedding, anniversary, or housewarming gift. With the row-by-row instructions there's no need to count all the little squares on the graph because it's already done for you. The graph can also be used for cross stitch. 

The graph is 160x160 stitches. The finished size will depend on your individual tension. At a gauge of 3.5 stitches per inch the finished size will be approximately 45x45" before any optional border, which is a good sized throw blanket. 

To make this afghan you will need worsted weight yarn, size H/5mm or I/5.5mm crochet hook or a size 8/5mm circular knitting needle if knitting (or whatever size you need to obtain the gauge), and a yarn needle to weave in yarn ends. Feel free to substitute the colors of your choice.

**Note for knitters: You'll want to follow the sc pattern. The pattern file says that it's written for crochet, but the color changes are the same for knitting. To knit: cast on 160 stitches. Following the color pattern listed in the file, knit each stitch on odd-numbered/right side rows and purl each stitch on even-numbered/wrong side rows.** 

This listing is for the PATTERN ONLY, not the physical blanket. If you don't crochet or knit and would like this made for you please contact me. I'll be happy to work with you to create it for you.

You are welcome to sell any finished afghans made from this pattern, but I would appreciate it if you would include a link back to this listing and give me credit as the designer.

Because this pattern is available as an instant download I cannot issue any refunds.

results.title: Live love laugh sign - Light bulbs metal wall decor - edison home art - housewarming gift
results.description:
Live love laugh sign - Light bulbs metal wall decor - edison home art - housewarming gift

5 pc set.

~ one piece without connections
~ handmade item


~ available in a variety of coloured wire: black, silver, brass, copper

***HOW TO CARE***

-brass or copper wire, without painting: these will oxidize with air and skin contact. I think the patinas are very pretty, but if you don’t like it, you can use a cleaning cloth, or an old tooth brush with paste or dishwashing liquid.

-wire with painting: I paint these by hand, with acrylic paint. These are more vulnerable, so please protect it from scratches, bumps, falls, etc.

-steel or aluminium wire: They are flexible, please protect it from falls, bumps, etc.

***ABOUT ME***

The perfect choice for your home, if you're searching for some beautiful and modern decoration.
The MirusDesigns products are produced in a little workshop in Hungary. They are all handmade unique pieces.

If you would like any changes (size, color etc.) send me a private message.
Please be careful with your item. If you unpack it the wrong way, you can damage it.

https://www.etsy.com/listing/924403960/add-front-or-back-text-shirt-add-on-item?ref=shop_home_active_4&frs=1

Rush Order:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/938446709/rush-my-order-expedite-processing-time?ref=shop_home_active_1&frs=1

Priority Mail:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/938469677/upgrade-to-priority-mail-or-express-mail?ref=shop_home_active_2&frs=1

Upgrade T-Shirt Size:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/938454573/upgrade-style-or-size-after-purchase?ref=shop_home_active_3&frs=1

⬥ WHAT'S INCLUDED: 
This listing is for one shirt only. Purchase them separately to make a set :) Adjust quantity or repeat "HOW TO ORDER" steps to add multiples.

⬥ ORDER COMMUNICATION: 
Check your Etsy messages FREQUENTLY after ordering until order is received. We may have questions or have received missing/incorrect info with order. NEVER email us, always use Etsy messaging.

⬥ CUSTOM REQUESTS:
We are NOT currently accepting custom orders other than our customizable listings (names, dates) marked "CUSTOM" in the title. If you have a design idea you would like to see in our store, please message us. We may already be in process of adding it!
 
Do not leave design change requests in notes with order unless approved by us. If so, it will not be accepted & the original design will still be sent. We accommodate when we can, but some designs we do not edit or cannot be due to time constraints. 

⬥ COLOR/DESIGN INFO: 
Please be mindful when choosing your shirt/text color combinations. Some combos are harder to read. We respect customer preferences and realize some like text more subtle. We do not offer exchanges/returns based on unfavorable color combinations.
 
NOT READABLE: White text on white or heather white, black text & dark grey text on black shades, dark grey text on dark grey or deep heather etc.

HARD TO READ: Black text on dark grey heather, rose gold on heather mauve etc.

SOMEWHAT HARD: White text on athletic heather or ice blue, dark grey text on some medium color shades.
 
We respect customer choice of color selection and process all color combos as selected. The exception is any combos from the "NOT READABLE" category above. We will attempt to contact you, but If no response on Etsy within 24-48 hours, we reserve right to change text colors to a readable text/shirt combo.

⬥ 3XL / 4XL / 5XL, KIDS:
Final sale on all 3XL/4XL/5XL, kids, and sweatshirts. These are special ordered items, no stock. Please allow and extra 1-3 business days for processing. Some colors may be out of stock by suppliers. To check color availability before ordering, contact us!
If your color is not available, we will contact you for another selection.

⬥ COLOR VARIATIONS: 
We try our best for accurately depict colors, but actual colors may vary from your screen display settings. Also, shirts may appear different in color/brightness (especially heathers) under various lighting conditions (studio, indoor, outdoor, etc.). We do not offer returns/exchanges for this.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
**IMPORTANT** SIZING & FIT: 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

⬥ GENERAL SIZING INFO:
Find your style below to see the general sizing info & recommendations.

Unisex sizes inches (cm):
••• Unisex XS: half chest 161/2″ (42 cm), full length 27″ (69 cm)
••• Unisex S: half chest 19 1⁄2″ (50 cm), full length 27″ (69 cm)
••• Unisex M: half chest 21″ (53 cm), full length 28 1⁄2″ (72 cm)
••• Unisex L: half chest 22″ (56 cm), full length 29″ (74 cm)
••• Unisex XL: half chest 23″ (58 cm), full length 30″ (76 cm) 
••• Unisex XXL: half chest 24 1⁄2″ (62 cm), full length 30 1⁄4″ (78 cm)
••• Unisex 3XL: half chest 28″ (71 cm), full length 33 (83 cm)
••• Unisex 4XL: half chest 30/(76), full length 34 (86 cm)

Kid's sizes inches (cm) 
••• 02A (Age 2): half chest 12″ (31 cm), full length 16″ (41 cm)
••• 04A (Age 4): half chest 13 1⁄2″ (34 cm), full length 17 1⁄2″ (44 cm)
••• 06A (Age 6): half chest 14 1⁄2″ (37 cm), full length 18 1⁄2″ (47 cm)
••• 08A (Age 8): half chest 15 1⁄2″ (40 cm), full length 19 1⁄2″ (50 cm)
••• 10A (Age 10): half chest 17″ (43 cm), full length 21 1⁄2″ (54 cm)
••• 12A (Age 12): half chest 18″ (46 cm), full length 23″ (58 cm)

Note: Any sizing info is general suggestions & NOT a substitute for measuring! Since body types & preferences can vary significantly, we DO NOT guarantee fit. ALWAYS MEASURE -- then compare size chart with your own shirt for best results! 

⬥ SIZING VARIATIONS:
Variations in measurements up to 0.5" are acceptable within manufacturer's guidelines.

⬥ STYLES:
 Unisex Tee / Unisex V-Neck

⬥ SIZING INFO:
••• Our Unisex tee is longer and looser than women's sizing & semi-fitted for men but works great for both.
••• For ladies: consider same size for relaxed, loose, knotted fit or size down for fitted look 
••• For men: same size for a more fitted look or size up for relaxed fit.
••• Most women say they run a little big, but opinions differ, and body types/preferences vary! Measure for best results.

⬥ MATERIAL:
(ALL PRE-SHRUNK)
••• Heather colors: 52% cotton / 48% poly -- Super-soft blend!
••• Athletic & Black Heather: 90 cotton /10 poly
••• White & other solids: 100% ring-spun cotton
••• 4.2 oz., lightweight & soft
••• Lighter colors may need layered

⬥ PRODUCT NOTES:
All shirts are made using high quality materials and pressed with a commercial-grade heat press for durability.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
SHIPPING
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

⬥ PROCESSING TIMES:
Your order will be ready to ship within 1-3 business days after payment clears on Etsy. 
(additional processing time required for special orders, 3XL-4XL,5XL and custom designs)

⬥ HOLIDAY SEASON: 
Longer times during holidays may apply.
Check shop Announcement for any cut-off date or processing time changes.
If ordered past cut-off deadline, we will still send via your shipping method even if it will not arrive before holiday.

⬥ SHIPPING TIMES:
All items are shipped via USPS, estimates are below: 
 
First Class Mail: 2-5 days
Priority Mail: 1-3 days
Priority Mail Express: 1-2 days
 
NOTE: Processing times are in addition to shipping times!!

⬥ WRONG ADDRESS:
Contact us immediately on Etsy if wrong address is entered. We will try to correct it but cannot guarantee since order may have shipped. We are not responsible if delivered to a wrong address entered by customer.

⬥ RUSH YOUR ORDER:
If you have a NEED BY DATE, please leave note with exact date.
We will try to accommodate the request & expedite the processing only. This does NOT expedite shipping times unless YOU upgrade. It is your responsibility to upgrade shipping in the event you need it by certain date!

To guarantee expedited processing (especially during busy holidays), purchase the "Rush your Order" listing: 

https://www.etsy.com/listing/938446709/rush-my-order-expedite-processing-time?ref=shop_home_active_1&frs=1

⬥ FREE SHIPPING to PRIORITY UPGRADE MAIL or EXPRESS UPGRADE MAIL

FREE SHIPPING promotions are for domestic, standard First Class mail only!
ALL free shipping on $35+ orders weighing under 16oz are sent First Class Mail, even if Etsy displays it as Priority Mail.
Contact us to verify shipping method. If you need to upgrade free standard shipping to Priority Mail use link:

https://www.etsy.com/listing/938469677/upgrade-to-priority-mail-or-express-mail?ref=shop_home_active_2&frs=1

⬥ SHIPPING LIABILITY:
••• We cannot guarantee USPS shipping times, they are only estimates.
••• We are never responsible for lost, stolen, damaged, or mis-delivered packages
••• We are never responsible for USPS transit delays or mishaps 
(once it leaves our store, it is beyond our control)
••• Etsy provides tracking by email with expected delivery, please watch for expected packages
••• We do not offer refunds or replacement order for USPS mishaps, buyer assumes risk 

WE DO NOT guarantee a delivery date. There are USPS delays that are out of my control.

Once your package has been handed off to the carrier, we do not have any control over when you ultimately receive it. Sometimes we will ship an order and the carrier will fail to scan it right away, meaning, the tracking information makes it appear your package has not left here when it has. If your order left our facility and is still in transit to you, we are unable to make the carrier deliver the package any faster If time is of the essence for your order, we suggest using USPS Next Day express. You can upgrade your shipping at checkout. First class is free.

⬥ DAMAGED PACKAGES:
••• If package appears damaged, DO NOT open. Take to local USPS to file a claim. 
Not Received:
••• If an item was marked "delivered" but not received contact the USPS immediately & file "lost mail" claim online
(also check with local P.O. branch, neighbors, and mail carrier)
••• Check with USPS for any delivery/transit issues. We will try to assist you on our end, but are only responsible for your order until it is scanned as "received" at post office. 
••• On occasion, missing packages turn up and are redelivered later once filed as lost mail.

⬥ RETURNED ITEMS:
Any items returned to us for any reason ex. (wrong address, undeliverable, etc.), buyer must pay reshipping fee to have order resent. We will attempt to contact you with link for repurchase. Any returned items in our possession for 90 days, with failure to receive response or reshipping payment, the items will be donated, and buyer will assume loss of order. 

Return/Exchange Listing:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/924441124/returnexchange-shipping-shipping-for-an?ref=shop_home_active_5&frs=1

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
POLICIES
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
 
Check "Shop Policies" tab on homepage for current policies & see FAQs for more info.

https://www.etsy.com/shop/ArdensApparel?ref=simple-shop-header-name&listing_id=924441124

⬥ CANCELLATIONS:
To cancel an order, you MUST contact us via ETSY (not email) immediately - within 1 HOUR of purchase.
No exceptions! We ship out fast...most likely we have already started on it.

⬥ RETURNS/REFUNDS:
We do not offer refunds or returns for any reason. 
Please verify all order details and read all "item details/description" section before ordering!
 
⬥ EXCHANGES:
 WHAT CAN BE EXCHANGED:
••• Eligible short sleeve crew & V-neck shirt styles ONLY
••• Must be from our standard (non- personalized) and non-seasonal listings 
 ••• See full list of exclusions - Many items in our shop are FINAL SALE.
 
⬥ OUR POLICY ⬥
••• Customer must pay ALL shipping charges (to/from) for exchanges.
••• We do not provide a return label.
••• Customer assumes the risk of any loss in shipping return items.
 
NOTE: To keep our prices low and continue to offer so many custom style & color options, we ONLY accept exchanges for a different size in some cases. 
 
Items exchanged for different size must be in same shirt style /color/ writing combo and design. Please read below for exclusions and conditions.
 
⬥ EXCLUSIONS (NOT ELIGIBLE):
••• Final sale/Closeout
••• 3XL & 4XL & 5XL sizes - due to special ordering
••• All Kids, infant bodysuits
••• All tank tops, long sleeve, & sweatshirts (these are seasonal)
••• Any listings with CUSTOM word, date, year, name to be entered
••• Changes to existing design requested by customer
••• Holiday theme or seasonal designs, season listed (ex. FALL vibes, 2020)
••• Special ordered items
••• Items with text added
••• Any hard to read color combinations (see list in "color/design info" heading above)
••• Unfavorable colors/ color variances from your screen
••• Wrong color selections/ entry errors
••• Any misspelled words by customer in entry box (we print exactly as you enter)
 
⬥ EXCHANGE TIMES:
Contact us: within 3 DAYS of USPS delivery date.
Item Returned to us: within 7 DAYS of USPS delivery date.

⬥ NO EXCEPTIONS: After these dates we can no longer accept exchanges as the items may have been worn, washed, etc.
 
⬥ EXCHANGE STEPS:
••• It is buyer's responsibility to contact us within 3 days to initiate exchange process & pay ALL exchange shipping fees (to/from)
••• Item must be approved for exchange then shipped back by customer to our address within 7 days of receipt.
••• To exchange for item of higher dollar value (ex. From XL to XXL) the difference must be paid.
••• The Re-shipment fee must be paid to cover shipping cost of the replacement item. Link below.
••• It is up to customer to request tracking on exchange packages and to notify us before shipping. We are not responsible for lost/ mis-delivered items that do not reach us.
••• Returned Item must be like-new. See FAQ below under "EXCHANGE - CONDITIONS"
••• We have the right to refuse exchange if exchange conditions are not met.
 
⬥ EXCHANGE SHIPPING FEE:
This covers the cost to ship the correct size shirt to you. It must be paid before item is sent. We will send a link via Etsy to purchase once we have received your approved return (or use link below). It must be paid before item is sent and within 5 business days of receiving the return item. Failure to pay or respond within 30 days, we reserve the right to cancel exchange & donate the returned shirt. 

Reshipment listing:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/924441124/returnexchange-shipping-shipping-for-an?ref=shop_home_active_5&frs=1

⬥ RETURN ITEM CONDITION:
Al items MUST BE in new condition…unworn, unwashed, undamaged, unused, & kept free of pet hair, stains, rips, smoke, &, & another odor, etc. Please make sure the item is in perfect condition before sending back for an exchange! 
SEE FAQ's for return item condition.
 
⬥ UNRETURNABLE CONDITION:
Any returned items not meeting the return conditions will be denied. A reshipping link will be sent via Etsy for you to pay to have the unapproved item sent back. Failure to do so within 7 days will result in loss of item which will be donated.
 
⬥ UNAUTHORIZED RETURNS:
Only send items to be exchanged if you have first contacted us and received authorization. Any exchange packages received (that have not been approved by us) -- the package will not be opened or processed. A reshipping link will be sent via Etsy for customer to pay to have package returned to them. Failure to do so within 7 days will result in loss of item which will be donated.
 
See our FAQ's below for our DETAILED return/exchange policy BEFORE ordering.
 
⬥ REPLACEMENTS/ ERRORS:
In the event we make an error, we will kindly work with you to get it resolved. 
 
REPLACEMENT CLAIM STEPS:
1.  Please contact us within 3 business days via Etsy (not email)
2.  Send a VERY CLEAR pic of the error & description via ETSY convo
3.  We will determine if it is an error on our part and send a replacement ASAP if so
 
EXCEPTIONS:
Any items that have large stains/spills/rips or tears (from opening package) or any other obvious damage that would NOT have been overlooked when packaging will be denied. No exceptions. We are human but also diligently look over every item before shipping.
We are not responsible for damage to item caused by customer after receipt.
 
PRESS MARKS/WRINKLES:
Any press marks/creases (from heat press) or wrinkles from package handling will be removed upon laundering your item. Please follow appropriate care instructions. This is not a reason for return or exchange.
 
DAMAGED PACKAGES:
If a package appears damaged upon receipt, do not open. Take to local USPS and file claim.
 
ERROR REFUNDS:
We do not offer refunds on any errors (even if need-by-date has passed) but will gladly send out a replacement. 
Please order in enough advance to account for any errors/unforeseen events.
 
⬥ CONTACT US:
If you do have a problem with your order, PLEASE contact us via ETSY so we can resolve any issues. Customer service is our top priority! We want you to LOVE your clothing and shopping experience!
 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
CARE INSTUCTIONS
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
 
**ROSE GOLD font & other metallic are COLD wash only, gentle cycle, inside out**

All others:
Machine Wash Gentle Cycle (Warm or Cold) or Hand Wash with mild detergent
Hang Dry (preferred) or Tumble dry Low
DO NOT Bleach or Iron on Design
 
See DETAILED CARE INSTRUCTIONS in our FAQ section for proper care of your garment!! 
We are not responsible for damage to garments due to improper care.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
CONNECT
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

⬥ Connect with us on social media for special promotions/sales! Share the love on social media and tag us for a chance of free giveaways! ⬥

https://www.etsy.com/shop/ArdensApparel

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
ABOUT US
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
 
We are a family-owned small business with big heart ❤ 
Thanks for choosing to shop with us! We hope you love our stuff as much as we do. Your supports mean the World to us. 
We love our customers and strive for excellent quality & customer service! 
  
Thanks for shopping!

Arden’s Apparel

results.title: Set 3 marble and gold foil effect digital prints. Live laugh love. Inspirational motivational quotes. Poster/decor. A4 size INSTANT DOWNLOAD
results.description:
A set of three delicate and inspirational prints, with marble and gold foil effects.

A beautiful, whimsical addition to your home decor. Serves to motivate and inspire. Great for the office, bedroom to wake up to, nursery; anywhere for some encouragement and inspiration. 

A discounted rate for the set of three!

You will be able to instantly download jpg files to print out yourself or take to a professional printer.

The files are A4 size.

We recommend printing on photo paper for the nicest effect. 

The images are as pictured, no frame or decorations included.

Thank you and enjoy!

Printable only, no physical product.
Unlimited prints.
For personal use only, not for resale.
Please note there will be colour variations between monitors and also the printed product.

results.title: Live Love WINE Sublimation Tumbler Designs - 20oz Skinny Tumbler Straight Wraps Templates - PNG
results.description:
This is a ready to print file for sublimation tumblers!

This file is designed for a 20oz Skinny Tumbler. (9.32in x 8.2in)

You'll receive a straight version ONLY. 


You may sell creations you make with this file, so long as the end product is physical.

You may not resell or give away this file.


Prior knowledge of sublimation is needed to use this file, please ensure you have all needed software and equipment before purchasing as we cannot offer support on any processes, we can only offer support on our files if there is an issue!

Your file will be available to download immediately after your payment has processed.

You will receive an email from Etsy with links to download the file or you can download here: http://www.etsy.com/your/purchases


I don't accept returns, exchanges, or cancellations, but please contact me if you have any problems with your purchase. 

Thank you for supporting our small business.

results.title: Live Love Laugh Printable Wall Art Love Quote Downloadable Print Navy Blue Wall Art Valentine Day Gift Valentines Day Decor Love Quote Print
results.description:
Live Love Laugh Printable Wall Art Love Quote Downloadable Print Navy Blue Wall Art Valentine Day Gift Valentines Day Decor Love Quote Print

MORE Prints, please look at my Shop - https://www.etsy.com/shop/HeartToHeartPrints
Section - Navy Cobalt Wall Art : https://www.etsy.com/shop/HeartToHeartPrints?section_id=18521376

This is an INSTANT DOWNLOAD which you can print on your home printer, or have the file printed by your local printing shop like Officeworks, Vista Print, Target, Kmart or Costco, or upload it to an online printer like Mpix, Snapfish or Shutterfly and have it posted back to you.

Please note this is a digital product for you to print. No physical prints or frame will be shipped.

YOU WILL RECEIVE :
- 3 Digital Download files: 16x20", 11x14", 8x10"
- Best quality JPG, 300 dpi

SIZES :
- 4x5” = 10x13 cm can be printed on A5 (148x210 mm)
- 8x10” = 20x25 cm can be printed on A4 (210x297 mm)
- 12x15” = 30x38 cm
- 11x14” = 28x36 cm can be printed on A3 (297x420 mm)
- 16x20” = 40x50 cm can be printed on A2 (420x594 mm)
On the A series paper sizes you can choose to trim the excess white space on the edges if you like.

Each JPG file is of a very high resolution at 300dpi (dots or pixels per inch). This simply means that they will look sharp and clear no matter which of the listed sizes you print (much sharper than the images on your screen now).
If you need another size, please sent me a message.

After checkout you will receive an email from Etsy with your order ready to download, as well as an instant link to download your files right from your checkout page. You can also access your downloadable files at any time through your Etsy purchase page.
Please visit the following Etsy link for help with Digital Downloads:
https://www.etsy.com/au/help/article/3949

Please note colours on different monitors may vary slightly and may be different again with each printer.
Print quality depends on the type of printer and paper used. When printing, use heavyweight, matte photo paper or card stock for best results.

For NEW buyers on Etsy :

HOW TO PURCHASE:
https://help.etsy.com/hc/en-us/articles/115013196707-Purchasing-an-Item?segment=shopping

HOW TO PAY:
Step 3: Select payment method.
You may be able to pay with a card via PayPal without a PayPal account. Here’s how:
1. Click Check out with PayPal and you’ll be redirected to PayPal. Instead of choosing to pay with your PayPal account, select Pay with Debit or Credit Card.
2. You'll be prompted to fill in your billing and credit card information.
3. Enter your email address so PayPal can send you a receipt.
4. Click Continue to return to Etsy. Your payment isn't sent until you click Submit order on Etsy.
https://help.etsy.com/hc/en-us/articles/115013196707-Purchasing-an-Item?segment=shopping

HOW TO DOWNLOAD DIGITAL ITEM:
https://help.etsy.com/hc/en-us/articles/115013328108-Downloading-a-Digital-Item?segment=shopping

HOW TO PRINT DIGITAL FILE:
What is the best paper for me to print my file on?
For printing, I recommend a high quality digital paper, cotton paper, high poundage art paper, or high quality photo paper (Archive Photo Paper, Archival Satin Luster Photo Paper). If you are using card stock, please use the highest quality possible, as inexpensive card stock can really dull the appearance of the best looking graphic design.

WHERE TO PRINT:
Home Printer • Local Print Shop • Staples • FedEx Kinkos • Office Max • On Line photo printing lab •
